Articles.Content: Would it be possible to create a night texture that only displays on the dark side of Kerbin?

Would it be possible to create a night texture that only displays on the dark side of Kerbin?

No, the texture display at any time of the day, making it imposible to make a night texture for night time.

Looks amazing. Can't get them on your dropbox though. Saw your edit about uploading elsewhere too. Thought about putting them up on the Space Port as well?

I will upload each planet separately and everyone can choose ;-)

I will upload each planet separately and everyone can choose ;-)

Cheers, do you do this because uploading everyone of them at the same time takes a long time?

I will upload each planet separately and everyone can choose ;-)

I'd prefer to just grab them all

There is no Eve too.

I have the pack and eve is there but there is no mun or minmus.

I have the pack and eve is there but there is no mun or minmus.

There is no Eve... What the hell is going on?
Well, it's an Alpha 0.1 guys, nothing to worry about if it isn't totally finished yet I guess.

All planets except Eve and Mun. ;-)

V0.2 soon
Anyone want a texture for a planet?
By the way, is the compatibility with EVA Followers fixed with Universe Replacer 3.0? I'm not saying the issue came from Universe Replacer, just wondering whether they are compatible now.

I would guess so..

Anyhow, I tried now all latest packs.. and gotta say, spacex34's is the most bad-ass one ;p

What's this with matte textures? And did anyone look into the kerbin2.png ? I feel like planet appearance could still be improved by adapting the specular/bump-map (assuming that is bump-map)

Ps.: The mun already has a very good planet texture imo. If we talk about textures in need of HD, Minmus ground-tile textures..... and Mun ground-tile textures.

Pps.: Ok, nearly overlooked that (needs first post mention)

AncientGammoner Matte 8k cloud version is by far the best visual effect so far (imo)

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/44135-0-21-x-Universe-Replacer-v3-0?p=581825&viewfull=1#post581825

Edited August 9, 2013 by eRe4s3r

I`v made this 4096x4096 skybox for myself, and thought I will share it:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/8a5khd0b6b81c5q/mordin86%20skybox.rar

Its simple, with many small stars, small nebula and galaxy. I was aiming for realistic look, I hope you guys like it.
So it's pretty impossible to use the 16k textures if you have any mods with parts installed. They just use too much memory. Think I'll stick with mushroomman pack, which is beautiful enough for me.

I would guess so..

Anyhow, I tried now all latest packs.. and gotta say, spacex34's is the most bad-ass one ;p
